data.text: Kinokhulhuvelha wiira nnookivilhelha ata kinakhalhaka ntu o uhikhalha ni irusho! Eiyo, nkivilhelheke vakani.
Kinowoonelhani ihache, nansho ihache ya Nlhuku mwanene. Ukhalhawaya, mwaattiva nri thoko mwalhi hinanarihiye kinvekinhe aka wa nlhopwana mmoka tu, Kuristo mwanene.
Nansho kinooshanga woona wiira, thoko inwaa chenre aya wo upenya nkaathepiacha Ahawa, ni inyu mwaatti irusho chinyu chinokukureehiya nkamwaahiya ukhulhuvelhiya winyu wo urera wa Kuristo.

Ukhalhawaya vanowa awe ntu riyoothe nkanhimiacha Yesu nkina hiri ulhe ninonhimiacha ihu, mwaatti nnompochera wo miono miilhi ama nnompochera Iphumu ama Malhove Orera ahinolhikaana mena ni alhe apochenre inyu ukhuma uwanihu!
Akinaanyihera wiira mii kimwankani waapwaha aneechiihana “akarumiya olhupalhe” ayo.
Veekinaka akichuwenlhe wulhumacha rata, nansho kihanaa irusho cho uchuwelha. Nahohimiacha nna nlhove nna mwaari uwaninyu, kila vakittu ni kila ikatema.
Chani kahowonya vaapannge aka wo wiitimarikha wiira kuuwelhiheni mwaatti wo uhimiacherani Malhove Orera a Nlhuku wo uhulhivihani ittu?

Vaavara aka ntheko munlhokoni mwinyu, kaapatta chittu chaaphavelha aka ukhuma wo milhoko cha attu anrumelhenlhe Kuristo chikina. Kinowooria uhimia wiira kahaathurulha mihakhu chaya kivare ntheko wo uukavihani mwaattiva.

Ni ikatema vaari aka uwaninyu mwaatti akanhuvinhe ntu riyoothe vaathananne aka chittu chaaphavelha aka. Ashilhoko ihu yaakhumme Umakedoniya yahokiwiihera kila ittu yaathananne aka. Kaakhalha wo wiichinanelha chinene wiira kihikhalhe nsigo wo iphiro iriyoothe, ni kinoothepa wiira chiicho.
Wo ikeekhene ya Kuristo iri nhina mwaka, khaawo ntu riyoothe mu Akaya mwonkhaye, nooria ukihiiha wiishipelha nenno nlhove nno.
Nlhatu waani etu wo wulhumacha chiicho? Wiira akinoottunani mwaatti? Mena! Nlhuku noochuwelha wiira kinouttunani!
Kinoothepa upanga thoko chinopanga aka naanano, wiira kihaavahe nipesha yayo “akarumiya olhupalhe” anothanana wiishipa wiira eti anoovara ntheko unopanga ihu hii ayo.
Ukhalhawaya ayo phi akarumiya o woothacha, anamitheko o uthepiacha aneechotheriha ukhalha akarumiya a Kuristo.
Akinoshanga vavawo! Ukhalhawaya ata Nakare mwanene nowiichotheriha ukhalha nnepa wo munthukoni!

Wo chiichammo etu nenno khanihiwe nlhove no ushangiha, yakhalhakaru wiira ata akarumiya awe ni ayo aneepanga ukhalha akarumiya o mitheko chinothanana awe Nlhuku. Umalha waya anowa upatta ntwarusho unophwanelhiya aya uttwaraana ni mitheko chaya.

Kinohokolhelha tho wiira, ntu riyoothe hikaanyihere wiira akirina irusho. Nansho mwaanyiheraka chiicho nkooneke etu ukhalha thoko kihirina irusho, wiira ni mii kikhalhe ni ittu yo wiishipa ata vakani.
Inohimia aka vano ilha kiheena ikuru ikilhehenre aya Athithi kihimiache vachulhu nna nlhove no wiishipelha nna, kineera thoko ntu hiri ni irusho.
Ukhalhawaya attu enchi aneeshipa wo nlhatu wo chittu cho velhaponi, ni mii etu kinowiishipa chiicho.
Mwaatti nneechoona phi attu o irusho? Phi nlhatu etu nnowaavilhelha ata attu ahiri ni irusho uno nteelhiyaka!
Nnonvilhelha ata ntu noopangani mwaattiva ipotta, ntu nokusha chittu chinyu, ntu nowaamererihani, ntu nooveehani ni uwaatani wiitho!
Uno kuulhiyaka muru, kinoorumelhelha wiira hii naari o uhuperiacha!
Chani yayo Aebraniya? Ni mii chiicho Muebraniya. Chani yayo Aisraeli? Ata ni mii Muisraeli chiicho. Yayo akhumme iyari ya Aburahimu? Ata ni mii chiicho kikhumme iyari ya Aburahimu.

Yayo phi anamitheko a Kuristo? Ata mii kinoolhumacha thoko ntu o ihalhahalha va, phi karumiya a Kuristo waapwaha ayo. Mii kihovara ntheko wo urikarika waapwaha ayo, kihottukiya ujeerani waapwaha ayo, kihaatakachiya mikwaju venchi waaapwaha ayo ni kahomwaatameria nookhwa venchi waapwaha ayo.
Wo mikwaha nthanu kahaafiulhiya ni Ayahudi mikwaju makhumi mararu khuwa tisa.
Kahaatiya ikopo ni Arumi mikwaha miraru, nkakaatiya malhuku nkwaha mmoka. Imeli yahokuntheelha mikwaha miraru, nkakaashelhelhiha mwommo mmaashini mmo uhiyu nkwee ni uthana vii.

Kiheetakacha mikwaha chinchi nkakaakumaana itatako cho utitimira mmaashini, cha attu o uvara makhuche, wa anenchi nanaka, wa attu ahiri Ayahudi. Tho wa attu o mmawaani, cho wiithuphini, cho mmaashini ni itatako ukhuma wa ashilhoko aka o woothacha.
Kihovara ntheko ni uhuva chinene, kihoshelhelhiha wo uhirupa ikhove venchi. Kihowolhiya ithalha ni nttona venchi. Kihottuka venchi ni uririiya wo uhikhalha ni ikuwo yo wiikhuneelha.
Wo uhaalhakelhaka chittu chikina chinchi, kila nihuku kinowehereriya ni mitheko cho waakaviha milhoko chonkhaye cha attu anrumelhenlhe Kuristo.
Ntu riyoothe ahupeeriaka ni mii kinoohuperia, ntu riyoothe awonyihiyaka, ni mii kinookelhiya ichuku munrimani.
Keeshipaka, kineeshipa wo nlhatu wo uhuperia waka.
Atotopelhiye Nlhuku ni Athumwanaya Athithi Yesu mahuku o uhimalha. Yayo ahochuwelha wiira akinoothacha.
Vaari aka Udameski nholhelhi o mkoa ri nkavihi a amwene Naareta, aheesha manyaasikari olhitelhelha wiira akivare.
Nansho kahokurushiya kinakhanlhe nttutuni, ittutu yulhupalhe. Nkakaaperettihiya vandirishani vashirini yaarukureria iwani iyo nkayaakurusha, nkakaakulhuphuwa mmathathani mwawe.
